snippet: A Cardinals executive, Judy Barada, and a Nationals broadcaster, Bob Carpenter, are sister and brother. Their family ties are stronger than any baseball series.
lead_paragraph: A Cardinals executive, Judy Barada, and a Nationals broadcaster, Bob Carpenter, are sister and brother. Their family ties are stronger than any baseball series.

headline.seo: Sibling Rivalry Plays Out in Cardinals-Nationals Series
headline.main: Sibling Rivalry Plays Out in Cardinals-Nationals Series
headline.print_headline: Sibling Rivalry Plays Out in Cardinals-Nationals Series
